mapper.select: SELECT sdd.date, ( SELECT count(*) FROM we_customer wc WHERE DATE_FORMAT( wc.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )= DATE_FORMAT( sdd.date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND wc.state = #{newGroup.emplCodeState} ) AS addCustomerNumber, ( SELECT count(*) FROM we_group_member wgm WHERE DATE_FORMAT( wgm.join_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )= DATE_FORMAT( sdd.date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND wgm.state = #{newGroup.groupCodeState} ) AS joinGroupCustomerNumber FROM sys_dim_date sdd WHERE DATE_FORMAT( sdd.date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) BETWEEN #{newGroup.beginTime} AND #{newGroup.endTime}
